short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple online chat service where you can move your cube while chatting with others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CubeChat is an extension where you can move your cube around the screen while chatting with other players. Keep track of how far you have moved your cube, and compete for the most distance moved!
